text: To be called a “haute couture” house, a business must belong to the Syndical Chamber of Haute Couture in Paris, which is unregulatedrenderedregulatedregulatingregulatedby the French Department of Industry. Members mustemployretreatexploredevelopemploy15 or more people and present their collections twice a year. Eachperspirationprescriptionpresentingpresentationpresentationmust include at least 35 separate outfits for day and evening wear.
